posts.title: Question about final project submission
posts.content: Does anyone know the deadline for the final project in Advanced Algorithms? The syllabus says next Friday but the professor mentioned something different in class.

comments.content: I asked the professor yesterday, it's definitely next Friday at 11:59 PM.
There's also an announcement about it on the course page.

posts.content: Looking for study group partners for the Economics midterm next week. Anyone interested?

comments.content: I'm interested! Let's create a group chat.

posts.title: Campus Library Extended Hours
posts.content: The main library will have extended hours (until 2 AM) during the final exam period starting next week.

comments.content: This is great news! Will the quiet study rooms also be available during these extended hours?
Yes, all facilities including study rooms will be available during extended hours.

posts.title: Campus Art Exhibition
posts.content: Don't miss the annual student art exhibition this weekend at the University Gallery. Featuring works from all departments!

comments.content: Looking forward to it! What are the opening hours?
10 AM to 8 PM on Saturday and Sunday. Hope to see you there!

posts.title: Math Help Sessions
posts.content: I'll be hosting additional help sessions for Calculus II every Tuesday and Thursday evening from 6-8pm in Room 305 until finals.

comments.content: Thank you so much for this! Will definitely be there.
